Text: 2007 New York Giants season:  They qualified for the playoffs as a wild-card team as the #5 seed, and beat the #4 seed Tampa Bay Buccaneers (9–7), the top-seeded Dallas Cowboys (13–3), and the #2 seed Green Bay Packers (13–3) to become the National Football Conference representative in Super Bowl XLII.

Text: 2007 New York Giants season:  It was the 7th league championship season for the New York Giants and their first since they won Super Bowl XXV in 1991.
